ProcedurePlanVariable.name: ProcedurePlanVariable
ProcedurePlanVariable.description: Represents the setup for any adhoc user-defined variable that can be linked to a procedure plan definition record.

DataType.description: The data type of the input procedure plan variable.

DefaultValue.description: The default value for the user-defined procedure plan variable.

DeveloperName.description: The unique name of the procedure plan variable record.

Label.description: The label of the procedure plan variable.

ProcedurePlanVersionId.description: The procedure plan version associated with the procedure plan variable record.
